problems.title: Replace Character in String
problems.description:
Replace all occurrences of a given character 'oldChar' with 'newChar' in the string and print the result.

Input Format:
First line contains a string.
Second line contains oldChar (the character to replace).
Third line contains newChar (the replacement character).

Output Format:
Print the string after replacing all occurrences of oldChar with newChar.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
Hello World
o
e

Sample Output
Helle Werld

Explanation:
All 'o' characters are replaced with 'e'.
problems.constraints:
1 <= length of string <= 1000
oldChar and newChar are single characters
hintsList: Iterate through the string. When you find oldChar, replace it with newChar.
